title: usage of mod_pagespeed brakes owncloud features
body:
when installing owncloud on an apache powered server which uses google's mod_pagespeed (https://developers.google.com/speed/pagespeed/mod?hl=de) following features did not work anymore on my debian server:

 - mounting owncloud webdav storage via davfs2
 - accessing contacts via carddav-sync app on an android smartphone

reproduction steps:
reproducing webdav issue:

 - download and install mod_pagespeed:
https://developers.google.com/speed/docs/mod_pagespeed/download?hl=de
 - restart apache
 - try to mount webdav resource:

```
mount -t davfs https://domain/owncloud/remote.php/webdav ~/dav
/sbin/mount.davfs: mounting failed; the server does not support webdav
```

reproducing carddav issue:

 - install carddav-sync on an android device: http://dmfs.org/carddav/
 - try to create a carddav account -> will result in an error, that the specified carddav url does not point to a valid carddav addressbook

environment that was used when the errors occured:
```
php --version
php 5.3.3-7+squeeze13 with suhosin-patch (cli) (built: jun 10 2012 07:31:32)

mysql --version
mysql  ver 14.14 distrib 5.1.49, for debian-linux-gnu (x86_64) using readline 6.1

apache2 -v
server version: apache/2.2.16 (debian)
server built:   feb  5 2012 21:35:42
```
